WorkItem.Description: I accidentally set my emulator to cut out mode and now I can't find a way to switch it back to non cut out mode or to even change the settings for that matter. Is there a keyboard shortcut or another way to access the settings or change it back?
WorkItem.Summary: How to access settings in cut out view?

Comments.Message:
Hello,

You can access the normal Wabbitemu menus by right clicking on the LCD.

Let me know if you have any other questions or issues.

BuckeyeDude
